index-create-account-prompt-1: Log in to access this feature!
index-reset-stats-desc: Enter "RESET STATS" to reset your stats:
index-join-team-help: Got a team link or code? Paste it here:
index-waiting-for-leader: Waiting for leader to start game
index-high-resolution: High resolution (check to increase visual quality)
index-mobile-tooltip: Visit surviv.io on your mobile device to play on the go!
index-team-kicked: You were kicked from the team!
index-swap-weapon-slots-ctrl: T or drag gun to other slot
index-use-ping-ctrl: Hold C, then hold Right-Click and drag mouse, then release Right-Click
index-use-emote-ctrl: Hold Right-Click and drag mouse, then release Right-Click
index-tips-1-desc: The goal of surviv.io is to be the last player standing. You only live once per game - there is no respawn!
index-tips-2-desc: If you've played other battle royale games like PUBG, Fortnite or Apex Legends, then you're already halfway there! Think of surviv.io as 2D PUBG (with slightly less desync and more chicken).
index-tips-3-desc: You'll begin the game with no items other than a simple backpack. Move around the map to find loot: weapons, ammo, scopes, and medical items. Eliminate other players and you can take their loot!
index-tips-4-desc: Players aren't the only thing that can hurt you. The deadly red zone will move in from the sides of the map and deal increasingly greater damage if you stand in it. Keep an eye on the map and stay safe.
index-shoot-ctrl-touch: Drag right stick outside stick border
index-pickup-ctrl-touch: Tap interaction button or loot name
index-use-ping-ctrl-touch: View map and tap anywhere on map
loadout-instagram-reward: Follow us on Instagram and get 15 Pass XP!
loadout-youtube-reward: Subscribe to us on YouTube and get 15 Pass XP!
loadout-twitter-reward: Follow us on Twitter and get 15 Pass XP!
loadout-facebook-reward: Like us on Facebook and get 15 Pass XP!
confirm-sell-modal-desc: Are you sure you want to sell the selected item?
loadout-some-survivrs-wear-the-dark-shir: Some survivrs wear the dark shirt.
loadout-on-the-plus-side-they-wont-see-y: On the plus side, they won't see you bleed.
loadout-rust-up-for-the-dust-up: Rust up for the dust up.
loadout-true-survivrs-wear-the-dark-glov: True survivrs wear the dark gloves.
loadout-special-issue-for-staffers-at-bu: Special issue for staffers at Bunker 1.
game-red-zone-advancing: Red zone advancing! Move to the safe zone
game-bottle-tooltip: Left-click to get Lucky for 20 seconds.
game-bottle-tooltip-desc: While the effect is active any lethal damage will reduce the health to 1 HP.
game-gunchilada-tooltip: Left-click to get Gunchilada effect for 5 seconds.
game-gunchilada-tooltip-desc: Consume to fire without reloading for 5 seconds (or until ammo runs out).
game-flask-tooltip: Left-click for freeze damage immunity for 20 seconds.
game-9mm-tooltip: Ammo for M9, G18C, M93R, P30L, MP5, MAC-10, UMP9, CZ-3A1 and Vector.
game-12gauge-tooltip: Ammo for M870, M1100, SPAS-12, Saiga-12, USAS-12, Super 90 and MP220.
game-762mm-tooltip: Ammo for AK-47, SCAR-H, M39, Mosin, SV-98, M1, BAR, AN-94, PKP, Groza, OT-38 and DP-28.
game-556mm-tooltip: Ammo for FAMAS, M416, M4A1-S, QBB-97, Mk 12, Scout Elite, and M249.
game-45acp-tooltip: Ammo for M1911, M1A1, Model 94, Vector and Peacemaker.
game-leprechaun-desc: When evading death via the Lucky effect gained by consuming a Bottle, you will also be teleported a short distance.
game-windwalk-desc: When taking fire, gain a short burst of speed.
game-rare_potato-desc: Always rotate to a high quality weapon.
game-aoe_heal-desc: Reviving and using medical items affects all nearby players.
game-steelskin-desc: Take reduced damage and reflect enemy bullets.</br>Increased size.
game-splinter-desc: Rounds fragment into three less powerful bullets.
game-small_arms-desc: Move faster with weapons deployed.</br>Decreased size.
game-takedown-desc: Kills grant health, boost and a short burst of speed.
game-tree_climbing-desc: Move through trees. Move faster in water.
game-scavenger-desc: Obstacles drop additional items when destroyed.
game-scavenger_adv-desc: Obstacles drop additional high-quality items when destroyed.
game-hunted-desc: Your location is revealed to all enemies.
game-chambered-desc: First and last round in each magazine deal bonus damage.</br>Does not apply to shotguns.
game-martyrdom-desc: Release several live grenades upon death.
game-targeting-desc: Bullets deal bonus damage to players with perks.
game-broken_arrow-desc: Air strikes call in two additional fighters.
game-fabricate-desc: Periodically fill your pack with frag grenades.
game-self_revive-desc: You can revive yourself when downed.
game-bonus_9mm-desc: 9mm bullets have increased speed, range, damage and spread.
game-flak_jacket-desc: Greatly reduces damage from explosions and shrapnel.
game-bonus_assault-desc: All your bullets deal bonus damage.
game-inspiration-desc: Your bugle call grants nearby allies a short burst of speed.
game-final_bugle-desc: When you die, nearby allies are bloodlusted for a short period of time.
game-trick_nothing-desc: Tricked! This perk does absolutely nothing!
game-trick_size-desc: Tricked! You ate too much chicken and grew in size!
game-trick_m9-desc: Tricked! You've been cursed with a developer 'treat'!
game-trick_drain-desc: Tricked! You're bleeding very, very, VERY slowly!
game-treat_9mm-desc: Treat! 9mm bullets are darker and deadlier.
game-treat_12g-desc: Treat! 12 gauge pellets are darker and deadlier.
game-treat_556-desc: Treat! 5.56mm bullets are darker and deadlier.
game-treat_762-desc: Treat! 7.62mm bullets are darker and deadlier.
game-treat_super-desc: Super Treat! ALL your bullets are darker and deadlier.
game-cupid-desc: Increase the time of the frenemy effect.
winter-event-desc: The New Year gives way to brutal snow storms, adding new environment challenges for those looking to be stealthy. We added an Ice Pick, Flask, a new Snow Fox Perk, and a new snow print mechanic to the Winter Map. These items are easy to find in Winter Crates.
winter-event-desc-end: Our Winter event ends on 1/20 at 23:59 PST. This is your last chance for Snowballs, Flasks, and Ice Picks.
woods-event-desc: The Woods Map is back. Exclusive new weapons include the Hawk 12G, and PKM.
woods-event-desc-end: Our Winter event ends on 2/10 at  23:59 PST. This is your last chance to use the Hawk 12G and PKM.
lock-event-desc: You may now lock analogs d-pads in place! Find this Setting using the Settings Button.
event-freenemies-start-desc: Love is in the air, a time to set aside differences. Enter the Heart Gun, a weapon which reduces the damage you take from your frenemy for 20 seconds. For a more explosive effect, we also have added the Heart Grenade to pacify a group all at once. It’s every reason to save up Boxes of Chocolate, the one guard you have against Heart weapons. You never know what you are going to get...in crates.
event-freenemies-end-desc: Our Frenemies event ends on 2/17 at 9 am PST. This is your last chance for Heart Grenades, Heart cannon, and Box of Chocolates.
event-savannah-start-desc: Snipers rejoice! The Savannah is back with a new Closer Perk ensures your grenades reach those pesky snipers from greater distances.
event-savannah-end-desc: Our Savannah event ends on 3/2 at 9 am PST. This is your last chance for the Closer perk.
event-st-patrick-start-desc: Are you feeling lucky? St. Patrick’s day has brought rainbow blasters to dole out a single instant death, and growlers to escape it. The luckiest few will don the Leprechaun perk, to teleport away when death is nigh. Check shamrock bushes and barrels for the above goodies.
event-st-patrick-end-desc: Our St. Patrick’s event ends on 3/18 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance for the growler, Leprechaun and rainbow blasters.
event-awesome-blossoms-start-desc: Spring has sprung and so have the Island cherry trees! The flowering season brings with it a building: the teahouse. This cozy piece of Japanese-inspired architecture features a golden chest that may contain a fun surprise or two.
event-awesome-blossoms-end-desc: Our Awesome Blossoms event ends on 3/30 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance for the teahouse and golden chest.
event-eggsplosion-start-desc: Failed (?) experiments in brownian wobble have caused Bunker 8 (The Egg) to spawn in more locations. Several GM fowl escaped in the incident, and have laid Eggs everywhere. Break Eggs for a brief Sugar Rush, as well as extra guns, ammo, or a chance to wear epic skins.
event-eggsplosion-end-desc: Our Eggplosion event ends on 4/13 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance for Sugar Rush, Eggs, and the Bunker 8 (The Egg).
event-sinko-de-ammo-start-desc: R&D efforts in AI and Robotics have given birth to The Pinata. Despite their resilience and speed, Pinatas can be hunted and broken, for a stash of valuable loot and Gunchiladas (which briefly negate the need to reload).
event-sinko-de-ammo-end-desc: Our Sinko de Ammo event ends on  4/27 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance for Pinatas and Gunchiladas.
game-pulseBox-tooltip: Left-click to get Pulse Box effect
game-pulseBox-tooltip-desc: Left-click to cause a non-damaging pulsewave, sending all survivrs and items away.
event-space-start-desc: To prepare for the inevitable future of space combat, the Survivr training initiative is conducting laser-based war games. Shoot around corners with ricocheting Lasr Gun fire; Passively reflect projectiles with your Lasr Swrd; Send opponents and items flying with a well-timed Pulsebox. Event items can be found in Space Crates around the map. May the 4th be with you!
event-space-end-desc: Our LASR SWRDS event ends on 5/11 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance to get Space Crates, the Lasr Gun and Lasr Swrds.
event-ultimate-sacrifice-start-desc: This week we honor the countless men and women who’ve fallen defending their nations, with a weeklong 50v50. Commanders who die now drop protective shields on death and summon airdrops. The river beds also have a surprise. May the heroes of history inspire you to comparable acts of courage and sacrifice
event-ultimate-sacrifice-end-desc: Our Ultimate Sacrifice event ends on 5/25 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance to experience the new Commander features.
modal-pass-rewards: Instantly get Gold Items from all levels reached, and unlock the rewards in upcoming levels.
pass-store-video-reward: Play on iOS or Android for XP Boost
index-team-bigger-than-duo: Mode selected cannot be played with more than 2 players
iap-confirm-buy-gp-desc: Are you sure you want to buy these GP for:
iap-confirm-buy-lto-desc: Are you sure you want to buy the items below for:
iap-transaction-error: The transaction could not be completed
event-storm-start-desc: Mysterious shifts in weather have thrown the island into chaos. Driving wind, rushing rivers, hail, and lightning strikes now pose mortal threats. Survivrs are advised to seek shelter, and avoid standing near static buildup.
event-storm-end-desc: Our Storm event ends on 06/08 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance to experience the Storm event.
store-offers-not-available: These offers are no longer available, click 'Okay' to load the new ones
game-watermelon-tooltip: Boosts movement speed by 1.1x for 10 seconds. Stackable.
event-beach-start-desc: Summer is here! Island staff have generously distributed Ice Boxes containing goodies: Cool off (and slow down) fellow Survivrs with water balloons and water guns, or find some refreshing Popsicles for a speed boost.
event-beach-end-desc: Our Beach Party event ends on 06/22 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance to experience the Beach Party event.
event-contact-start-desc: Experiments in spacetime folding have been partially successful. Wormhole probes recently brought back data from deep space, but also brought new guests to the island. Mothrships have begun to appear – often dropping hosts of Skittrs, and eggs containing alien technology. Survivrs are encouraged to continue wargames, but avoid contact at all costs... a cure to Skittr infection has not yet been found.
event-contact-end-desc: Our Contact event ends on 07/20 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance to experience the Contact mode.
store-offer-already-bought: This bundle has already been purchased. New bundles will refresh soon.
modal-account-desc-1: Customize Battletag, and save progress cross-device.
modal-account-desc-2: Equip the Gear you´ve earned, or sell it for more GP.
modal-account-desc-3: Open Crates for epic new loot.
game-nitroLace-tooltip: During 10 seconds, all shots will inflict the Burning effect.
game-phoenix-desc: User heals slowly from fire, lava, or burning effect, but takes damage at the same rate while out of it.
game-pyro-desc: Increases range and damage of user’s fire weapons by ~20%.
event-inferno-start-desc: Experiments in timeline manipulation led to a few successes: minor folds in spacetime, brief island-wide flashbacks, etc. Our plan was never to send the whole island back to its primordial volcanic state, but that sure was an exciting breakthrough! We just hope a full revert is possible. For now, Survivrs are encouraged to avoid lava, and hide from anyone carrying a flamethrower.
event-inferno-end-desc: Our Inferno event ends on 11/17 at 1 pm PST. This is your last chance to experience Inferno mode
prestige-confirm-report-desc: Why do you want to REPORT this player?
prestige-confirm-report-desc-2: WARNING: Dishonest reporting can get YOU banned!
prestige-confirm-endorse-desc: Why do you want to ENDORSE this player?
warning-prestige: Please select a reason to proceed
contextual-offer-text-2: more Gold Potatoes to get this item.
contextual-offer-text-3: Would you like to buy more GP?
free-gp-text-description-1: As a reward for your stellar performance in recent war games, here's some free Gold Potatoes!
free-gp-unlinked-note: (NOTE: Spending GP requires that you Log In)
free-gp-text-description-test-1: TEST GIFT We want to reward all Survivrs with free Golden Potatoes, for a stellar performance in recent war games!
market-sell-explanation: Listing an item costs 50 GP, and lasts 24 hours. If someone buys your item before the listing expires, you’ll earn the sale price minus a 5% market fee. Otherwise, your item will be returned.
market-unlocked: Please reload the page or change tab to access the market
market-error-buy-gp: Not enough potatoes to buy the selected item
market-error-buy-item-expired: Item expired or has already been purchased
market-error-item-already-posted: This item has already been posted
market-error-sell-rarity-or-price: Wrong rarity or maximun price exceeded
market-error-item-equipped: This items is equipped in the loadout, please unequip it to sell it on the market
market-error-not-posting-fee: Not enough potatoes to list an item
market-error-not-your-item: The specified item does not belong to you
market-modal-expired-text: It's been 24hrs, and your item's market listing expired without selling. Your item has been returned to your Loadout. You can list it again (consider a lower price, to improve your odds of success)
event-gobble-day-desc: Happy Holidays Survivrs! From Thursday (11/26 @ 4pm PST) to Monday (11/30 @ 4pm PST), you'll receive 2X FREE GP from the Offerwall. (That's the shiny gold button under Missions, in the Home screen). Enjoy!
modal-stimfied-active-text-2: Mission XP from any Battle started in the next
ftue-modal-text2: (Note: You can log in to avoid seeing this popup again)
ftue-inst-1: Click Battle to start your first match. “Classic” is the game mode, and “Solo” Means you’ll play without a team.
ftue-inst-2: Move with WASD, aim and punch/shoot with the mouse.
ftue-inst-3: Grab items you find. Break Crates or kill enemies for items.
ftue-inst-4: Equip and Use your guns/items with the buttons on the right.
ftue-inst-5: Access the map by pressing M, or clicking the minimap.
ftue-inst-6: This is the Map. You are here!
ftue-inst-8: Beacons hint at where to make progress!
ftue-mobile-inst-1: Use the left joystick to move, aim and punch/shoot with the right stick.
ftue-mobile-inst-2: Equip and Use your guns/items with the buttons on the right.
ftue-mobile-inst-3: Access the map by tapping the minimap.
limited-crate-error-not-active: This crate is not active yet!
support-title: Need Help? Please read this first...
support-text:
If you suspect someone cheated in a battle, please use the in-game Report system (found by spectating that player).

To share feedback and game ideas, or ask questions, join your fellow survivrs on Discord!

To report more than three cheaters a day, or technical issues, please include details in the following form.

Our goal is to help you have fun! Please keep interactions with support civil and respectful. For more information, see our Code of Conduct.
boost-warning: HAVE SQUADMATES LOG IN, TO ACCESS PRESTIGE ISLAND AND GET XP BOOST
boost-warning-custom: All squadmates must be logged in for custom battles.
join-header: Send INVITE LINK to invite friends. (No Boost from Autofill)
ONE-TIME-SHOWN-description: This exclusive skin is only available right here, right now!
modal-banned-warning: WARNING: STRIKE #0 GETS A 9 DAY BAN!
modal-banned-title-disban: STRIKE #3: This account was banned for
modal-banned-title: STRIKE #3: This account is currently banned for
modal-banned-final-txt: For now, if you’d like to play on Trainee Island, you may log out from Prestige Island and come back later.
free-gp-text-description-massive:
This year has been crazy for everyone, and we appreciate your continued support of Surviv. Thanks for sticking with us.

You've been selected to win 1,000 free Gold Potatoes. Use them to get skins in the Shop, from Bundles and Crates, or to grab your favorite skin on the Market.
index-error-code-desc: Please check your Battle Code and try again
index-error-code-desc-teams: This battle code is not for a team game
index-error-code-waiting: You can create only 1 custom game every 3 minutes
warning-confirm-prompt-register:
No Account is linked to this Login.
Create account?
index-error-linked-desc: This login is already linked to another account. To unlink or delete that account, please follow the steps in this Help Article.
index-unlink-desc: In order to keep your account and store your items and experience, one account must be linked at all times. If you would like to close your account permanently, you can do so with the Delete Account button in your Settings.
index-join-msg: Are you sure you want to join this clan?
index-remember-message:
Supported formats: PNG, JPG, BMP
Max file size: 5 MB
Your image will be resized automatically.
index-delete-clan-warnimg: (This action cannot be undone. You won’t be able to access this clan anymore)
index-leave-clan-warnimg: (This action cannot be undone. You won’t be able to re-join this clan unless you’re re-invited)
ONE-TIME-BOUGHT-description: This exclusive skin is only available right here, right now!
index-support-ukrainians-description: All item sales during the week will be donated to support Ukrainians
index-delete-error-msg:
There are still members who belong to your clan.
You cannot delete this clan until there are no members left besides you.
index-failure-message: Your clan couldn’t be created due to an internal error :(
index-has-clan-message:
You already belong to a clan.
Please, leave it before entering another one.
index-clan-full-message:
Oops! Something went wrong, please try again later.
This clan is already full, try again later or join another one.
index-clan-error-message: Oops! Something went wrong, please try again later.
index-discard-msg:
You have made changes.
Do you want to discard them and exit?
index-found-account-desc:
An Account is linked to this Login.
You may continue.
index-clan-incomplete-data-message: Oops! Your clan data is incomplete, please check and try again
index-hub-no-results:
No result matches your criteria :(
Please try again
index-select-icon-msg: Select the icon that represents your clan spirit the best!
index-discord-error-message:
Only official Discord links allowed.
Please verify.
index-tournament-notification-descriptio: The competition is over! Your rewards are already in your account.
index-leave-msg: Enter "LEAVE" to leave this CLAN & COMPETITION:
index-warning: WARNING: If you leave your clan now you won’t be able to collect the clan rewards. If you are the last member, the clan will be deleted.
index-join-success-msg: You joined {clan} successfully, but you won’t be able to participate in the clan competition until the next cycle!
index-tournament-info: Rewards are given automatically to player wallets once the competition is over. New Clans will not participate until the next competition starts, and players that join a Clan during an ongoing competition will not count towards the competition stats, and will not receive the rewards.
